name: Burning Box
description:
So, you want to be a wizard huh? You like the idea of throwing fireballs at people huh? Well lets see if you can manage to clean up these boxes before you take  on the real world. Oh by the way the walls reflect your fireballs back so have fun.

Just a simple game about a novice wizard who hasn't fully mastered the fireball spell.  Burn away all the boxes as quickly as you can without getting burned yourself.

If you enjoyed it or have any suggestions, please leave a comment.

Controls:

WASD/Arrows  to move

Left Click to shoot

P/Tab/Esc to pause

R to quick retry

M to mute/unmute audio
